items.raw_desc: Konzol játék Onimusha: Way of the Sword - PS5: Onimusha: Way of the Sword PS5Onimusha: The Way of the Sword immerses you in a dark and bloody story set in the Edo period in Kyoto, Japan. Get ready for intense sword fights where every blow decides life or death. Each mission is filled with mystery, danger and suspense. In the skin of a samuraiAs a samurai, you embark on a journey of revenge and knowledge. Your only ally is the Oni Glove, a mystical artifact that grants you superhuman strength. With it, you can confront the creatures of the underworld called Genma, who threaten not only you, but also the flow of history itself.
